text: The men's triple jump event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 16 and 18 July. ==Medalists== {| According to an unofficial count, 31 athletes from 23 countries participated in the event. ==References== Triple jump Category:Triple jump at the World Athletics U20 Championships
